com.stripe.stripeterminal.model.external

Enum PaymentStatus


  • public enum PaymentStatus

    A PaymentStatus represents any of the states that a single payment can be in.

    Use of this SDK is subject to the Stripe Terminal Terms: https://stripe.com/terminal/legal

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      NOT_READY
      Terminal is not ready to start a payment. It may be busy with another command, or a reader may not be connected.
      PROCESSING
      Terminal is processing a class PaymentIntent
      READY
      Terminal is ready to start a payment. Create a class PaymentIntent, and then call Terminal.collectPaymentMethod to begin reading a card.
      WAITING_FOR_INPUT
      Terminal is waiting for input from the customer (e.g. for a card to be presented to the reader).

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • NOT_READY

        public static PaymentStatus NOT_READY

        Terminal is not ready to start a payment. It may be busy with another command, or a reader may not be connected.

        See Also:
        Terminal

      • READY

        public static PaymentStatus READY

        Terminal is ready to start a payment. Create a class PaymentIntent, and then call Terminal.collectPaymentMethod to begin reading a card.

        See Also:
        Terminal, class PaymentIntent, Terminal.collectPaymentMethod

      • WAITING_FOR_INPUT

        public static PaymentStatus WAITING_FOR_INPUT

        Terminal is waiting for input from the customer (e.g. for a card to be presented to the reader).

        See Also:
        Terminal

      • PROCESSING

        public static PaymentStatus PROCESSING

        Terminal is processing a class PaymentIntent

        See Also:
        Terminal, class PaymentIntent
